public RadarThread(Context ctxt,
                   SurfaceHolder sh,
                   int pix_per_meter,
                   Handler h)
Creates a radarthread

Parameters:
ctxt - The apps base context
sh - a surface handler
pix_per_meter - THe amount of pixels per meter (controls scale of battle field)
h - A handler to send messages to main thread (currently unused)
